title: Automated Invoice Application
description: A Python application that can create pdf invoices using a csv file as data input, python for document layout and generation and github actions to create the invoices on a monthly basis.

title: Ashton Phillips Portfolio
description: A portfolio website for model/actor Ashton Phillips. The website contains a gallery of images, videos and a contact form.

title: Pokemon Library
description: A library using an already built Pokemon API, it includes various filters and lookups.

title: Final Year University Project
description: A educational tool built using JavaScript using a Midi keyboard for input. The tool is designed to help users learn to play the piano by providing feedback on their performance.

title: Inventory Tracker
description: My first php application built using CakePHP5; a inventory tracker that allows the user to add/edit/delete stock items and levels. Certain criteria applies to items pricing and stock levels.
